dict.acceptation: 暗示；意味；隐含；说明，表明；

sent.orig: It can also imply a recovery from some kind of slump or period of quietude.
sent.trans: 它也暗示了从某种衰退或是沉寂期的恢复。

sent.orig: Abundant lions imply abundant games, and that again means abundant vegetation.
sent.trans: 狮子的众多正暗示着其他猎物的众多，同时也意味着植物的茂盛。

sent.orig: The name would imply that the sport trains police dogs.
sent.trans: 光看名字，会以为是体育方式训练警犬。

sent.orig: Furthermore, Natural Laws such as Gravity, Inverse Squares, Cause and Effect, and Thermodynamics imply a Law-giver.
sent.trans: 此外，自然的法则，如重力，逆平方定律，因果关系，以及热力学意味着必有法则的赋予者。

sent.orig: The reality is both better and worse than these numbers imply.
sent.trans: 现实可以说比这些数据乐观，也可以说比它们惨淡。
